title: (Hardcore) Deadofwinter (Terre Haute Melodic Hardcore)
description:
Deadofwinter is an amazing Hardcore Punk band based out of Terre Haute, Indiana.  They have been together for many years, and released many CD&#039;s.  What makes this band so great is their incredible melodic instrumentation.  Deadofwinter is too great to explain verbally, so I recommend you visit their myspaceor purevolume (http://www.purevolume.com/deadofwinter) (if you go there and listen to the first track, "If you&#039;re sorry you wouldn&#039;t have done it", it will change your life) to get a better sense of their sound.

Included in this torrent is their CD "The Indifference of Good Men", two tracks off of their rare EP "West Consin", as well as an early press of their upcoming, untitled CD.

The Indifference of Good Men:

1.  "Maintaining a C+ Average" - 2:53
2.  "Turning State&#039;s Evidence" - 3:24
3.  "To Be Held in Your Arms" - 4:16
4.  "Lipstick Stains on Cigarette" - 2:47
5.  "February&#039;s Confinement" - 3:05
6.  "Learn your ssn" - 5:10
7.  "Utility Lion" - 5:12
7.  "Maybe She&#039;s Just Playing Hard to Get" - 4:51
8.  "They Say You Never Really Know a Person" - 7:14
9.  "[Bonus Track]" - 6:10

The West Consin EP:

1.  "If you&#039;re sorry you wouldn&#039;t have done it" - 2:59
2.  "The Picard Manuever" - 2:41

New Album:

1.  "If you&#039;re sorry you wouldn&#039;t have done it" - 2:59
2.  "Turning State&#039;s Evidence" - 3:27
3.  "Track 3" - 2:48
4.  "Track 4" - 3:00
5.  "The Picard Manuever" - 2:38
7.  "Track 6" - 3:26

If you like this music, and are anywhere in the midwest, PLEASE go see these guys perform.  They put on a great live show, and would love to have you come out.  I personally am good friends with the guitarist and singer, and he&#039;s a great guy!

Also, if you like this, check out my other torrents!  I only upload quality stuff!
